panels.title: Multiple Edge Cluster for Development (RPI 5 EA, Seoul, Electronics Building)

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
$__timeGroupAlias(datetime, 1m),
avg(temperature) AS "temperature"
FROM beacon_ip.data
WHERE hostname LIKE 'rpi6431' AND
$__timeFilter(datetime)
GROUP BY 1
ORDER BY $__timeGroup(datetime, 1m)

$__timeGroupAlias(datetime, 1m),
